# Notation {.unnumbered}

This appendix summarizes the notation used throughout this book.

## Sets

| Symbol | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| $\R$ | Real numbers |
| $\C$ | Complex numbers |
| $\N$ | Natural numbers |
| $\Z$ | Integers |
| $\R^n$ | $n$-dimensional Euclidean space |
| $\R^{m \times n}$ | Space of $m \times n$ real matrices |

## Vectors and Matrices

| Symbol | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| $\bx, \by, \bz$ | Vectors (boldface lowercase) |
| $\bA, \bB$ | Matrices (boldface uppercase) |
| $\bI$ | Identity matrix |
| $\mathbf{0}$ | Zero vector or matrix |
| $\bA^\top$ | Transpose of $\bA$ |
| $\bA^{-1}$ | Inverse of $\bA$ |
| $\bA^+$ | Moore-Penrose pseudoinverse of $\bA$ |

## Operations

| Symbol | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| $\inner{\bx}{\by}$ | Inner product of $\bx$ and $\by$ |
| $\norm{\bx}$ | Euclidean norm of $\bx$ |
| $\trace(\bA)$ | Trace of $\bA$ |
| $\det(\bA)$ | Determinant of $\bA$ |
| $\rank(\bA)$ | Rank of $\bA$ |
| $\diag(\lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_n)$ | Diagonal matrix |

## Eigenvalues and Singular Values

| Symbol | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| $\lambda_i$ | Eigenvalue |
| $\sigma_i$ | Singular value |
| $\lambda_{\max}(\bA)$ | Largest eigenvalue of $\bA$ |
| $\lambda_{\min}(\bA)$ | Smallest eigenvalue of $\bA$ |

## Optimization

| Symbol | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| $\nabla f$ | Gradient of $f$ |
| $\nabla^2 f$ | Hessian of $f$ |
| $\bA \succ 0$ | $\bA$ is positive definite |
| $\bA \succeq 0$ | $\bA$ is positive semidefinite |
| $\arg\min$ | Argument that minimizes |
